title: Chocolate Journey
description: Interactive DPP demo showing all 7 stakeholder interfaces for a chocolate bar
longDescription:
# About the Project

Chocolate Journey is an open-source demonstration of Digital Product Passports in action. It shows how different stakeholders (farmer, processor, manufacturer, retailer, consumer, recycler, regulator) interact with the same product data.

# Technical Implementation

Built with Next.js and TypeScript, using IPFS for decentralized storage and Ethereum for immutable record-keeping.

# Impact

Used as reference implementation by 3 EU DPP working groups.

title: Manufacturing Icon Set
description: 250+ open-source icons designed specifically for industrial interfaces
longDescription:
# About the Project

A comprehensive icon library for manufacturing and industrial applications, filling a gap in existing icon sets.

# Features

- 250+ icons covering common manufacturing operations
- Available in SVG, React, and Figma formats
- Designed for legibility on factory floor displays
- MIT licensed

# Impact

Downloaded 10,000+ times, used by major manufacturers globally.

title: Wallet UX Patterns
description: Documentation of UX patterns for Web3 wallet applications
longDescription:
# About the Project

A comprehensive guide to designing wallet interfaces, covering authentication flows, transaction signing, key management, and recovery.

# Content

- 40+ documented patterns
- Real-world examples from popular wallets
- Accessibility and security considerations
- Figma templates

# Impact

Used by wallet development teams at 5+ Web3 companies.
